@description.body:

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2007-2008 Derrell Lipman License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Derrell Lipman (derrell) Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: All of the resizing information about a column. This is used internally by qx.ui.table and qx.ui.progressive's table and may be used for other widgets as well.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
left {Integer} Any integer value for the left position,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any integer value for the left position,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
top {Integer} Any integer value for the top position,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any integer value for the top position,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
width {Integer} Any positive integer value for the width,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any positive integer value for the width,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
height {Integer} Any positive integer value for the height,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any positive integer value for the height,
   always in pixels

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map of which layout sizes changed.
@return.description: A map of which layout sizes changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the computed width of the column.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the column's flex value

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Set the column width. The column width can be one of the following values:

  • Pixels: e.g. 23
  • Autosized: "auto"
  • Flex: e.g. "1*"
  • Percent: e.g. "33%"

@param.name: @param
@param.body: flex {Integer?0} Optional flex value of the column
@param.description: Optional flex value of the column

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property minWidth. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #minWidth}.
